name: Freestyle Ice Skater
description:
Freestyle Ice Skater is a casual action/sports game that takes place in real and fictional locations. Your goal is to join the local freestyle ice skaters - Nagyerdei Korisok - master your tricks and beat the rival team in an epic freestyle battle.

Key Features:
-Single player story mode where you progress by learning new tricks (mapped to keypress combos) / or solving puzzles.
-Free skate mode on the maps with a couple of extra elements.
-Fish game mode (a kind of a tag game, optionally with powerups)
-Achievements
